title: ISRO NRSC Jobs 2025 - Apply Online for 13 Technician, Draughtsman and Other Posts
description: The ISRO National Remote Sensing Centre (ISRO NRSC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 13 Technical Assistant, Technician B, and  Draughtsman Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th, ITI, and Diploma in Civil Engineering can apply for the ISRO NRSC Jobs 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned ...
